thread.title: Wine-month festivities: Celebrate the grape
thread.title_full: Wine-month festivities: Celebrate the grape - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Mark C. Anderson
title: Wine-month festivities: Celebrate the grape
text:
Photo: Goncalo Rio print_article_embed|photo-8504182|article-6458795|7 comments_jump_embed|photo-8504182|article-6458795|1 email_share_embed|photo-8504182|article-6458795|1 facebook_share_embed|photo-8504182|article-6458795|2 twitter_share_embed|photo-8504182|article-6458795|3 pinterest_share_embed|photo-8504182|article-6458795|4 reddit_share_embed|photo-8504182|article-6458795|5 google_share_embed|photo-8504182|article-6458795|6
The Golden State makes 90 percent of the country’s wine — and 3 out of every 5 bottles enjoyed in the United States — while drawing 21 million visitors to wine country regions every year. More good reasons California Wine Month has become a prime time to celebrate appear here. For more wine month festivities, visit www.discovercaliforniawines.com/californiawinemonth.
